name: Internal Revenue Service (DEMO)
description:
INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE

SAINT MATTHEW IS AT YOUR DOOR.

(TECHNICALLY A FNAF FAN GAME)

It has been ten years since you last paid your taxes. Ten wonderful and wondrous years of pure evasion and cheer. Ten lovely, so lovely, years of money kept, not stolen. The I.R.S. doesn't even know you exist!

But the facade is coming loose.

A single cent has now left your bank account. A single cent, taxed. The audit is coming, and your world is falling apart. Can you survive the grating social world of your fellow anti-taxers? Can you fend off the I.R.S. Agents breaking into your home at night? Can you? Well, now you can! (Or, well, at least in the demo.) 

(Made during NaNoRenO 2022)

(There are, for sure, some spelling mistakes or bad punctation in here. Just, like, ignore it? I'll put it thru Grammarly eventually. )

CONTENT WARNING: There is a surprisingly higher-than-average mentioning of drugs. Like, absurdly surprising amount. I don't even know how I did that. It's all in jest, but, seriously, I've never made so many jokes about drugs like that in such small time. Wow.
